mapper.update: update t_review r JOIN t_payment_status p ON r.ipayment = p.ipayment SET r.contents = '' , r.rating = 0 WHERE r.ireview = #{ireview} AND p.istatus = #{istatus}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(ireview) FROM t_review WHERE iuser = #{iuser} and ipayment = #{ipayment}
SELECT P.iuser FROM t_product P JOIN t_product_payment PA ON P.iproduct = PA.iproduct WHERE PA.ipayment = #{ipayment}

SELECT COUNT(R.ireview) as countIre, U.rating from t_product P JOIN t_product_payment PP ON P.iproduct = PP.iproduct JOIN t_review R ON R.ipayment = PP.ipayment JOIN t_user U ON U.iuser = P.iuser AND R.rating IS NOT NULL and R.rating > 0 WHERE P.iuser = #{iuser}
